info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 4:53PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Yavapai County approaching Bagdad through 515 PM MST... At 451 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 25 miles southeast of Diamond M Ranch to 15 miles northeast of Bagdad to 11 miles northwest of Skull Valley. Movement was southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bagdad, Yava and Mount Hope. This includes State Route 96 from Bagdad to Yava. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
